Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
hospital.usermanagment.User
hospital.usermanagment.Staff
hospital.usermanagment.Doctor
public class Doctor extends Staff
Represents a Doctor user with capabilities to manage appointments and patient records.

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(int userID, String password, String role, String name, String email, String contactNumber, String staffID, String specialization, AppointmentManager appointmentManager)
      Constructor with AppointmentManager.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique user ID.
      password - The password.
      role - The role (should be "Doctor").
      name - The doctor's name.
      email - The doctor's email.
      contactNumber - The doctor's contact number.
      staffID - The doctor's staff ID.
      specialization - The doctor's specialization.
      appointmentManager - The AppointmentManager object.
